body:
We (canonical) have used gccgo a fair amount on arm64 little endian but not
at all big endian. You could maybe ask on the linaro-toolchain list.
On 2/03/2016 6:26 am, "Ian Lance Taylor" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> I'm sorry, I do not know whether or how much gccgo has been tested on
> arm64, either big- or little- endian.
>
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/14567#issuecomment-190822831>.
>
